text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump You continue to LIE at your daily shitshow. You dragged your feet for 2 months and pretended the coronavirus was little more than a bad cold. You sent our PPE stockpile to China and now we are suffering and dying with no evidence this is slowing down at all. https://t.co/V5bywOHIfM
